name: AnimeVerses! The Demo
description:
Welcome My Friends ! TO AnimeVerses! The Demo

If You and your friend Bored And you have two controllers WELL WELCOME ! 

This Demo Is For you !

You Have 20 characthers from OnePiece ! ( More Animes in the full Game ! )

In the future we will add Demon Slayer And Bersek And Naruto And Many More !

With all their Powers You can SMASH your friend with your AMAZING ! BEAST ! COMBO ! 

The Game Has been made by the Arabic team : ButterStudio

We have a facebook page by the way With the same name : ButterStudio

We hope you like this game

-ButterStudio <3

For more infos read the README.txt File in the game folder.
